headline: RBC Upgrades Church & Dwight to Outperform, Hikes Price Target to $114
summary: Church & Dwight (NYSE:CHD) is one of the Best Stagflation Stocks to Buy Now. In early May 2025, the company unveiled a major shift: it had begun relocating production for key items, like Waterpik flossers, out of China. Management expects this adjustment to trim roughly 80% of its ~$190 million anticipated annual tariff exposure. On June 2, 2025, […]
